Localization.Name: Aegis Dynamics
Localization.Description: Aegis grew to prominence as a manufacturer of military spacecraft during the First Tevarin War. Favored by Ivar Messer, their orbital bombers grew to public prominence after his infamous victory on Idris IV and became synonymous with the ruthless Messer regime that followed. After the Fall of the Imperator, Aegis' contracts were stripped, their ships fell out of favor with the public, and the company went into a tailspin. They downsized their craft production and turned to manufacturing parts. However, time heals all wounds and today Aegis has risen once again to be a top military contractor of ships and components.

English.Name: Aegis Dynamics
English.Description: Aegis grew to prominence as a manufacturer of military spacecraft during the First Tevarin War. Favored by Ivar Messer, their orbital bombers grew to public prominence after his infamous victory on Idris IV and became synonymous with the ruthless Messer regime that followed. After the Fall of the Imperator, Aegis' contracts were stripped, their ships fell out of favor with the public, and the company went into a tailspin. They downsized their craft production and turned to manufacturing parts. However, time heals all wounds and today Aegis has risen once again to be a top military contractor of ships and components.

Localization.Name: Polar
Localization.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: Aegis Dynamics 
Size: 1
Grade: B
Class: Military

Built to the high demands of daily military service, Aegis’ Polar cooler features a reinforced frame for increased durability. You can rest assured that when you drop into the fires of combat, the Polar will keep your ship cool.
